snippet.title: Rushdown Rivals - Official Launch Trailer (Newgrounds Beat Em Up Feat. Pico, FNF, Madness)
snippet.description:
PLAY FOR FREE NOW
Newgrounds: https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/862886
Itch.io: https://spagato.itch.io/rushdown-rivals
Rushdown Rivals finally releases with the unveiling of a new experience and some new faces.

Drive back evil robotic versions of several NG characters as your own NG icon. Stylishly dance through them as Cassette Girl, shoot them with Hank's personal arsenal, unleash Girlfriend's inner demon, and so much more in this tough-as-nails action game.


==============================================================================
This is a FAN-MADE game. All characters depicted belong to their respective creators.

CREDITS

KEITH GARCES - Director / Animation
SPAGATO - Director / Sound
MILKYPOSSUM - Theme Song
JOECANVAS - Character Portraits
IAMJOEYREX - Background Design/Voice

CHARACTER CREDITS

PICO, DARNEL, NENE - Created By Tom Fulp
CASSETTE GIRL - Created By SoftDon
HANK - Created By Krinkels
SON - From Dad 'n Me
GIRLFRIEND - From Friday Night Funkin
ALLOY - MindChamber

#free #games #gameplay #trailer #indiegame #cassettegirl #fnf #fridaynightfunkin #girlfriend #pico #newgrounds #launchtrailer #freegame #flash #flashgame #action #arcade #fighting #beatemup #robot #alloy
